accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

Union of Needletrades, Industrial and Textile Employees

did.unittitle: Quilt - 36"54" - 1948 Boyertown, PA, Osan Mfg. Co., Inc.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Red and black background with hand stitched squares - ironing boards, thread, buttons, UNITE!, sewing machines. -- See photo in box with item

did.unittitle: Commemorative Plate -- Human Dignity - An Eternal Quest

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 1914 - Textile Workers Union of America 1939 - United Shoeworkers of America 1937 - United Hatters, Cap and Millinery Workers International Union 1901
